thread.section_title: C2G Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of C2G | www.cablestogo.com
thread.title: Jack Stout

author: Jack Stout
title: Jack Stout
text:
They have a very good and flexible website. It makes shopping for cables easy. They have good prices, their cables have always been of good quality. They provide all the specs, including ratings required if it is run behind drywall.
The one issue I have, and it's very minor, is that if you choose a "number of items per page" to be other than the default of 12 (come on, we aren't using modems anymore) to say, 72 (which is max) that works fine but it doesn't "stick" and so when you go back, it is again set to 12.
